name: Spells
description: In this section, you'll find everything you need to know about mastering the art of spellcasting. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced wizard, this comprehensive guide will take you step-by-step through the process of learning and casting spells.$(p)The spells are organized by category, including charms, curses, jinxes, hexes, and more. Each spell is accompanied by a detailed description, including its incantation, wand movement, and the effects it produces. You'll also find tips and tricks for mastering each spell, as well as common mistakes to avoid.
